content: in cid 63 space chain 3 3 dcs in same space chain 1 3 dcs in next space* every corner repeat from * to * three times end 3 dcs in space chain 3 3 don t forget to turn your blanket at the end of cid 63 dcs in same space chain 1 slip_stitch into first chain 3 turn every round - you should have a space available to being your next round round 4 you will make a 3 double_crochet square + 1 chain in when changing colours work the first two dcs cid 63 every space across and two squares + 3 chs in every of the first square over top of the strands for fewer corner as foll strands to weave in at the end chain 3 2 dcs in space chain 1 *3 dcs in next space chain 3 3 dcs in same space chain 1 3 dcs in next space chain 1 repeat to corner repeat from * to * around finishing with a sl st into the first chain 3 turn round 5 chain 3 2 dcs in space chain 1 * 3 dcs in next space chain 1 repeat to corner 3 dcs in next space chain 3 3 dcs in same space chain 1* repeat from * to * around finishing with a slip_stitch in first chain 3 turn repeat round 5 until blanket is desired size or until you run out of yarn end with a slip_stitch into first chain 3 of last round worked cut yarn and pull end through weave in all ends when kelly isn t busy knitting and designing she is exploring the rocky mountains with her dog or probably drinking tea this pattern is for personal use only not for profit © kelly mcclure etsy www bohoknits etsy com blogger www bohoknits blogspot com ravelry bohoknits
